p: Direct myocardial damage occurs as a result of SARS-CoV-2 interaction with myocardial tissue by binding the viral glycoprotein Spike 1, after its activation by the serine 2 transmembrane protease expressed by the host to ACE2 receptors, expressed especially in cardiac pericytes, leading to direct tissue damage and, in a further moment, a downregulation of these receptors [ 14].
